subject: [cc-community] Podsafe Librarian Job Opening at WFMU
body:
I was asked to forward this about an opening at one of the coolest radio
stations ever...




WFMU is currently developing a massive online archive of free music and
audio downloads (CC-licensed, public domain, other rights-cleared
material), and we're hiring a new full-time person to help us with the
project. Feel free to pass this posting along to anyone who might be
qualified. Thanks!

-Liz

JOB DESCRIPTION:

WFMU seeks an individual with background in online media and
non-commercial radio to develop and oversee WFMU's Free Music Archive,
an online music library licensed for free non-commercial use. The
Podsafe Music Library Director will oversee the acquisition and
licensing of material and will maintain relationships with the Archive's
partners. Candidates must have a strong understanding of web
technologies, copyright, music licensing and online music. Must be
extremely knowledgeable about a variety of music, have good writing and
organizational skills and be able to supervise staff. A complete job
description is at: http://www.wfmu.org/pmld.html . Deadline for
applications: May 15th. Salary range 35-40k, plus benefits. Send a cover
letter, resume and references to WFMU, FMA Search Committee, PO Box
5101, Hoboken, NJ 07030. EEO Employer.
